--- Kraftlos <kraftlos@...> wrote:

> OOC: The base has shields up and there is already someone how has set
> foot
> outside the door.  You ignored the fire from the turrets on the front
> gate
> (which is facing toward the ocean, away from the city where the
> battle is
> happening) and from Guardia who is in the small bunker beside the
> gate
> behind a thick metal half-wall.  (fire can come out of the shield,
> but not
> vice versa).

OOC: Actually as I said they are just firing from above, and not from
the front, and they are hitting the shielding I thought. Perhaps I miss
worded. But I can ajust it if so. However I did miss the person leaving
the gates - I'm not always paying the proper attention - sorry. It is
obvious to anyone in the base that the Sweeps are not trying to get in,
only to keep the base 'covered'. Will post a sub post soon to reflect
the activity at the post.

Preston
(Da'minion)
